title.narrative: Technical support of trained CBOs for the animation of CRCs in Mali

description.narrative: Results. - 12 internal debates were organized, and 12 feedbacks were made by the clubs, whose excerpts were broadcast in / by the radio during the debates. These debates involved 45 local women's organizations were mobilized in the CRCs. - 266 persons, of whom 97% were women, were mobilized in these CRCs to discuss on the topics developed in magazines

The 15 CBOs Women who benefited from the capacity-building workshop on CRC facilitation methodology in Q1, continued their interaction activities with local radio stations. The CBOs collaborating with the radio stations were expected to produce feedbacks in response to these radio stations productions. Coordination of CRC activities and their interactions with radios was provided by a local Radios Club Consultant

participating-org.narrative: Ministery of Foreign Affairs of The Netherlands
